Key Match Events: Giancarlo Stanton hit his 25th home run for the 10th time in his career
Gleyber Torres had three hits, including a two-run double in the third inning
Anthony Rizzo had a two-run double in the Yankees' five-run sixth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Gerrit Cole exited the game with a right calf cramp
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Volpe and Alex Verdugo, the bottom two batters in the Yankees lineup, had one-out singles in the third inning before Torres doubled for a 2-0 lead
Others: The Yankees (80-58) remained a half-game ahead of Baltimore in the AL East
The Rangers (58-80) have lost four of their previous five games
